tool_description: Analyzes relationships between sources by checking cross-references, identifying citation patterns, and mapping academic genealogies.

source_citations.description: List of formatted citations to analyze

error_messages: Insufficient citations: At least 2 citations required for cross-checking.
Too many citations: Maximum 200 citations can be processed at once.
Invalid citation format: Ensure citations are properly formatted strings.
Analysis failed: Unable to parse citation relationships from provided data.
usage: Provide an array of source_citations in standard format. Optionally enable check_duplicates and find_clusters for comprehensive relationship analysis.
